Oct. 3, 2015 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Memorial Hall, Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Euphonium, Mid Rhondda Band. Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100 7 bands competed.
Oct. 5, 2015, 11:39 p.m. July 4, 2020, 10:09 p.m.
1 Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter The Snaring of the Sun
2 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs The Graces of Love
3 Crwbin Silver Band Lynne Turner Dimensions
4 Ynyshir Band Dean Evans Variations on Laudate Dominum
5 Briton Ferry Band Jeffrey Pearce
6 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small Essay [Gregson]
7 Cross Keys Silver Band Benjamin James Atkinson Red Mountain
